item.title: Wat Another Blog Again
item.description: What happened this time? Yep, I’ve gone and built yet another blog. This time I can’t be bothered hosting it on my own magic domain so for now it’s just in GitHub Pages. It’s still Hugo? Yes, still based on Hugo. I have a real love for static site generation even if it’s sometimes a pain to work with. This time I’ve used some guide on using GH Actions to make this work, so I can just git push and stuff happens.
